snippet: The satellite broadcaster said Anthony Cumia used racist and sexist epithets about a woman he accused of assaulting him.
abstract: Satellite radio broadcaster Sirius XM fires its prominent talk-show host Anthony Cumia over series of comments on Twitter that included racist and sexist language.
lead_paragraph: The satellite broadcaster said Anthony Cumia used racist and sexist epithets about a woman he accused of assaulting him.

headline.main: Sirius XM Radio Fires a Host of ‘Opie & Anthony’ Over Racist Twitter Posts
headline.print_headline: Sirius XM Fires Radio Host Over Racist Twitter Posts
